page.title: 06THE WOMEN'S INSTITUTE
page.content: We are active in village life, we do not all live in Goodnestone. One mem_ ber is from Aylesham, one from Staple and eight from Chillenden. One of us is a School Governor and one a Parish Councillor. Five are on the parochial council and several on the Village Hall Committees of Goodnestone and Ch_ illenden. Members help with cleaning and flower arranging in the church. Meals on wheels are delivered in Ayl_ esham by members. Others help organise the Fete held at Goodnestone Park. We collect prescriptions and medicines for the elderly. One organises and raises money for the pensioners dinner at Christmas. Five belong to the Moth_ ers Union. Two raise money for the League of Friends of Canterbury Hospital.
